GSD.description:
block: Fix wrong offset in bio_truncate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.19 by commit 4633a79ff8bc82770486a063a08b55e5162521d8. For more details please see the references link.
